welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saitama, Japan! Get ready to experience the perfect blend of modern city life and traditional culture. Don't miss out on exploring our beautiful parks, historic temples, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: 分上野薮 かねこ

restaurants.address: 浦和区仲町2-9-11, さいたま市, 埼玉県, 330-0062
